skill.name: Image Generation & Vision
skill.description: Generating images and using vision models.
skill.content:
# Multimodal Operations
## Text-to-Image Requires a TTI binding (e.g., `diffusers`).
```python lc = LollmsClient(tti_binding_name="diffusers", ...)
img_bytes = lc.generate_image( prompt="Cyberpunk city", width=1024, height=1024 ) ```
## Vision (Chat) Send images to a vision model.
```python discussion.add_message( sender="user", content="What is this?", images=[base64_image_string] ) response = discussion.chat() ```
